sentences.en: After a few games, Balser got out a pail of nuts.
sentences.cn: 玩过几个游戏后, 贝索拿出一桶核果.

sentences.en: Give the pail a good swill ( out ) .
He fetched a pail of water.
He kicked over the pail through carelessness.
She can lift a pail of water from the ground.
The boy jarred against a broken metal pail.
sentences.cn: 那男孩敲个破铁桶发出刺耳的声音.

sentences.en: The maid plunged the cloth into the pail and cleaned the floor.
sentences.cn: 那个侍女把拖把放进桶里浸湿,用来擦地.

sentences.en: The pail will hold four gallons.
The sway of the pail caused some milk to spill out.
sentences.cn: 桶一晃荡,泼出来一些牛奶.

sentences.en: The water drained out of the hole in the pail.
There is a quart of milk left in the pail.
sentences.cn: 桶里还剩下一夸脱牛奶.

sentences.en: There was a pail of water on the ground.
Throw a pail of water over him - that'll sober him up.
sentences.cn: 浇他一桶水,这会使他清醒过来的.

sentences.en: Will someone fetch a pail of water?
sentences.cn: 有人打了一桶水 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a metal or wooden container with a handle, used for carrying liquids
